thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The little gem of NYC
thread.title_full: The little gem of NYC - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Evelyn H
title: The little gem of NYC
text:
I stay at the library hotel a lot. I love the personal attention and the warm, friendly feeling that the hotel staff generates.
This stay, however, my room was so hot that I had to open the window, letting not only the cold air in but all the noise of the city.
My pillows were so hard that I had to fold up my puffy jacket and sleep on it. Didn't get much sleep.
Never have had a complaint in all the years I have stayed with you. I am alone and always feel safe, welcomed and well taken care of.
